name:
Classic Games Overload:
Card & Puzzle Edition
formal_name:
Classic Games Overload:
Card & Puzzle Edition
description:
The most comprehensive card games collection for Nintendo 3DS…plus you get over 1,000 unique puzzle challenges! You get almost unlimited gameplay:

Classic Card Games - select from Hearts, Spades, Euchre, Bridge, Gin Rummy, Canasta, Cribbage, Crazy 8's, Go Fish, Romme, and Skat.
Casino Card Games - play BlackJack, Texas Hold'em, Double Flop Hold'em, Omaha, 5 Card Draw, 7 Card Stud, Pineapple, Crazy Pineapple, and 5 unique versions of Video Poker.
202 unique versions of Solitaire - select from your favorites like Klondike, FreeCell, Spider, Golf, Beleaguered Castle, Forty Thieves, Canfield, and many others.
404 unique Mahjong layouts
505 unique Tangram puzzles
101 unique Picture Puzzles
Wireless multiplayer gameplay plus Single-player options with challenging AI
Detailed statistics to track your performance and achievements
Full 3D backgrounds and selectable in-game graphics
disclaimer:
Due to the size of this game, it may take longer to download the digital version of this title when compared to other Nintendo eShop games. At the time of purchase you can choose either “Download Now” to begin to download the game immediately or “Download Later” to download the game when the system enters “sleep mode.”

You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
